programme.title: Celebrity Family Feud
programme.desc: The classic Family Feud format has entertained a generation, and this hilarious celebrity reboot sees Emmy-award winning talk show host Steve Harley at the helm, as your favourite celebrities and their families play the game, thinking on their feet and trying to second guess the general public.

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S5
programme.desc: Returning season of the classic game show, hosted by Michael Strahan. With the help of their game partners, contestants paired with celebrities must guess words or phrases that appear on the show's pyramid-shaped gameboard to win money.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Celebrity builder and presenter Tommy Walsh (Ground Force) brings in the experts to help real people make real home improvements, whatever the budget. There's never been a better time to get smart, practical tips on home improvements that make your space work better for you - but don't break the bank. Master builder and household favourite Tommy Walsh is joined in this brand new BBC series by expert pro cleaner Maxine Dwyer and creative carpenter Asher Edwards.

programme.title: Planet Action S2
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S39
programme.desc: (Encore) Hosted by Pat Sajak, this game show features 3 contestants who try to solve a puzzle by spinning the wheel and guessing letters in a word or phrase.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Teddies 2
programme.desc: When Tizzy notices that her friends are lazing around and not doing anything, she decides that they need to get fit. However, while trying to turn their living room into a gym, they end up getting all the exercise they need - even before using the gym! Later, the teddies are excited to make pies, scones and soup out of an enormous pumpkin in their garden - but getting it into the house turns out to be quite a challenge.

programme.title: Hiccup & Sneeze
programme.desc: Bibi is going on a winter holiday. Hiccup and Sneeze want to tag along too, even though they don't know what winter is. After learning that it snows and it's freezing in winter, they try to persuade Bibi to go somewhere warmer instead.

programme.title: GUS The Itsy Bitsy Knight
programme.desc: Follow small, grasshopper-sized boy named Gus who wishes to become the greatest knight in all the kingdom of Karamel! Armed with his laser sword and mounted on his electric pony, Gus will never miss an opportunity to pursue adventure and win the day.

programme.title: Ready Jet Go! S2
programme.desc: On a really windy day, Jet has trouble flying his saucer. Once he gets back to his yard, he wants to know about wind and its effects, big and small. Sydney, Sean, Jet, and Mindy pursue that idea in the neighborhood and then around the Earth (with Celery's help). In the end, Jet uses some new wind knowledge to get his saucer up and flying straight.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S1
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Pinkfong Wonderstar
programme.desc: Pinkfong crashes into the roof of a house, and in doing so, finds a best friend and problem-solving partner named Hogi. Pinkfong has the power to make wishes a reality, and Hogi has gained a lot of knowledge through reading. This inspires them to form Wonderstar', a problem-solving team that serves the townspeople of Wonderville - and beyond!

This team of heroic kids and their robotic pets stands on call, ready to leap into action when danger strikes animals around the world.

programme.title: Pokemon Master Journeys: The Series S24
programme.desc: It's a big, big world, but you know where to find Ash and Goh---battling and catching Pokemon from Kanto to Galar! With Pikachu, Cinderace, and their other Pokemon beside them, our heroes continue to travel all over the world to research Pokemon for Cerise Laboratory.

programme.title: Super4orce
programme.desc: A water theme park is being terrorized by an unknown force, scaring the visitors and TJ. Meanwhile in school Wanda contemplates if she should team up with the boys or join the popular kids. However, when the 3 boys need her help to catch the invisible villain, Wanda finds it hard to refuse. After saving the day, a strange encounter with another mysterious man - Mr Smith, makes Super4orce doubt Vincent's intentions. Just then strange electric bolts start shooting about.

The children travel to the Desert to find the last snack box to win a mystery prize, but they are always a step too late! Will they find the last box of snacks to win the prize?

programme.title: My Little Pony: A New Generation

programme.desc: The number of Singaporeans with chronic diseases like diabetes and hypertension is increasing. One effective treatment is taking the exercise 'pill'. Find out from Dr Fadzil Hamzah how staying active helps manage diabetes, while Active Health coach Mason describes how having a health vision and the appropriate exercise benefit you. Bonus - Irene Ang and Chua Enlai drive home a stay-active message through comedy.

programme.desc: The world's largest conservation project has been created in China. Discover the breathtaking wildlife hidden inside its stunning national parks. This stunning series opens with China's mountainous terrains, where foxes, antelopes, and snow leopards thrive in harsh conditions. It then moves to dense forests that host the extraordinary snub-nosed monkeys and iconic giant pandas.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth
programme.desc: This landmark six-part documentary series charts the planet's most spectacular events of migration, rebirth and transformation. Over the course of a turbulent year, we witness how finely tuned creatures face the Earth's seasonal patterns. However, in the 21st Century these patterns are becoming more extreme, less predictable and dangerously unreliable. From Asia to Europe, Africa, Australia, North and South America - we witness the drama & the spectacle.

programme.title: 我们的2030愿景
programme.desc: 2021年，新加坡处理了3750万个20英尺的集装箱，创下历史新高。30多年来，我们一直都是全球最繁忙的港口之一。有了大士港口，我们要在未来10年，取得更骄人的成绩。目前，66个泊位中的5个已经在2022年完成，并投入运作。这个划时代的智能港口在2040年竣工后，将成为全球最大的全自动港口。它每年将能处理多达6500万个20英尺的集装箱，比我们目前6个港口的总吞吐量还要多。我们需要扩大港口的规模，因为我们要在2030年把出口值增加到至少一兆新元。离岸贸易值方面，目标则是两兆美元。我们要如何达到目标？随主持.

programme.title: 寻医
programme.desc: (重) 主持人吴俐璇首次乘船出诊，将医疗服务送到印度阿萨姆邦一条大河上的村庄里。大河将村民隔绝在现代医疗之外，唯有医疗船，能把疫苗接种和紧急接生等服务带给孤立无援的人。雨季大河年年洪涝，医疗船该怎么救死扶伤？.

programme.title: 爱的救援

programme.title: 绝妙的遗产
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 英培想感谢桂玉的救命之恩，从银行提了一千万现金，准备送给桂玉。桂玉这时接到警察的电话，急忙赶去警局，因而错过和英培见面的机会。.

programme.title: 绝妙的遗产
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 替金刚跟踪英培的吴兴植，听见英培和同桌老妇提到结婚的话题，误以为英培要和对方结婚，便将此事告诉金刚。金刚以为父亲要结婚，连忙将此事告诉兄弟们。.

programme.title: 脚踏食地
programme.desc: 这回文杰来到森美兰州继续发掘更多不一样的美食和当地风光。文杰从芙蓉乘搭当地的市区巴士掀开这趟旅行，经过连环山脉, 首先来到了一家售卖烟熏鸭的店家。一般上马来人比较少接触的鸭肉，来到森美兰州却是很普遍不过的食物。沿途不难发现，路边也有不少摊位在售卖烟熏鸭。说到森美兰，不能不提神安池旧皇宫Istana Lama Seri Menanti，在1992年改为皇室博物馆，这一座没有使用钉子和螺丝的“无钉皇宫”是它特色之一。米南佳保族（Minangkabau）是森美兰州的原住民，沿着小路会看到很多牛角顶屋的传统屋子。.

programme.title: 逛遍全中国
